title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server for running large language models locally with a simple API and model library.

title: langchain-ai/langchain
summary: Python & JS framework that ships first-class Ollama integration for building LLM-powered applications.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Self-hosted ChatGPT-style web interface that connects to any local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Community thread sharing RAG notebooks and scripts that pair Ollama with Chroma & LangChain.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama, published to Maven Central for JVM projects.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with chat history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop app for chatting with Ollama models on Windows/macOS/Linux.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-laravel
summary: Laravel package that exposes an Artisan command and Facade for chatting with Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama server on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images (CPU & CUDA) for running Ollama in containers.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate on crates.io providing strongly-typed async bindings to Ollama.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with NuGet package supporting streaming chat and embeddings.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models using slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that bridges Ollama models into Slack channels with rate-limiting.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI assistant pane powered by any Ollama model.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve example showing how to scale Ollama models across a Ray cluster.
